description:
Koyomi Araragi and Shinobu Oshino unexpectedly time warped back to May 13th 11 years ago. Koyomi thinks of saving Mayoi Hachikuji, who was “destined to become a ghost after getting into a traffic accident on her way to see her mother the next day – Mother`s Day.” 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kabukimonogatari: Mayoi Jiang Shi Sono Ni
傾物語 まよいキョンシー 其ノ貳
